Thanks for coming out and being so adventurous! If you came but forgot to turn in your taste-test card, let me know to make sure you get full credit. And by the way, the fruits we tried - in order - were:

Nance: Byrsonima crassifolia (Malpighiaceae)
Passion Fruit: Passiflora edulis (Passifloraceae)
Guanabana/Soursop: Annona muricata (Annonaceae)
Mango: Mangifera indica (Anacardiaceae)

Guava: Psidium guajava (Myrtaceae)
Lulo: Solanum quitoense (Solanaceae)
Tamarind: Tamarindus indica (Fabaceae)




And of course:

Durian: Durio zibethinus (Malvaceae)
